level.heading: Redisclosure.
level.text: Mental health information disclosed pursuant to this subchapter shall not be redisclosed except as specifically authorized by subchapter II, III or IV of this chapter or for the purposes of and in accordance with Chapter 2A of this title.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 18-273 substituted "of this chapter or for the purposes of and in accordance with Chapter 2A of this title" for "of this chapter".
D.C. Law 19-171 validated a previously made technical correction in the section designation.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 204(c) of Data-Sharing and Information Coordination Emergency Amendment Act of 2010 (D.C. Act 18-530, August 6, 2010, 57 DCR 8099).

For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 204(c) of Data-Sharing and Information Coordination Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 2010 (D.C. Act 18-582, October 20, 2010, 57 DCR 10118).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-136, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 7-1201.01.
For history of Law 19-171, see notes under § 7-242.
